CustomField.description: DeveloperName of the Contact RecordType used for portal customer contacts (e.g., Portal_User, Customer_Contact). Leave blank to use the default Record Type.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the DeveloperName (API Name) of the Contact Record Type to assign when creating new portal contacts. Leave blank to use the org default. Example: Portal_User
CustomField.label: Customer Contact Record Type
